description: This file is a PostCSS configuration script for a Next.js project using Tailwind CSS. It defines a plugin setup, optionally including the '@tailwindcss/postcss' plugin based on an environment variable, and configures plugins like tailwindcss, autoprefixer, and postcss-preset-env with specific options.

methods.name: config
methods.description: A configuration object for PostCSS plugins, dynamically including the '@tailwindcss/postcss' plugin based on environment variable.
